Object Shape: Circle, Cylinder, Egg, Star-like, Other, Unknown
Summary: Hovering over the field and on another account over my roof.
divs: Sighting Detailsim lilly im 14 and i was sitting out my window on a number of occations when i have sin hovering objects they single out from starts they move around and some times i can watch them shoot back up to the sky. on one particular occation i just oppend my window and i saw a browny, greeny, goldy what looked like metal up close space ship going straight over my roof right next to my window i rubbed my eyes but it was still there i rached out for it to touch but didnt reach im sure it new i was teeas it soon speeded up. on another occation it was hoovering over the feild a little down the road. i have sin more then 1 in anight about 4at te most and thse are here most nights. when you first see one you think your mad you tell your friends and your parents but they dont belive you i honestly thought i was mad but the more and more i see it the more and more i belive it.
